mapper.sql: test_id, user_id, test_name, test_type, test_skill, test_mode, test_state, starttime, endtime
mapper.insert: insert into testinfo (test_id, user_id, test_name, test_type, test_skill, test_mode, test_state, starttime, endtime, test_content) values (#{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{testContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into testinfo
test_id,
user_id,
test_name,
test_type,
test_skill,
test_mode,
test_state,
starttime,
endtime,
test_content,

mapper.update:
update testinfo
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_name = #{testName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_type = #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_skill = #{testSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_mode = #{testMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_state = #{testState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
test_content = #{testContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update testinfo set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_name = #{testName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_type = #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_skill = #{testSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_mode = #{testMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_state = #{testState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, test_content = #{testContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update testinfo set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_name = #{testName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_type = #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_skill = #{testSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_mode = #{testMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_state = #{testState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into testinfo (user_id, test_name, test_type, test_skill, test_mode, test_state, starttime, endtime, test_content,applicant) values (#{userId}, #{testName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{testContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select a.test_name as testName, a.test_type as testType, a.test_skill as testSkill, a.starttime, a.applicant, a.test_content as testContent, b.standard_id as standardId, b.standard_name as standardName, b.standard_number as standardNumber, b.standard_source as standardSource from testinfo a left join teststandard b on a.user_id=b.user_id and a.test_id=#{testId}

select a.test_name as testName, a.test_type as testType, a.test_skill as testSkill, a.test_content as testContent, b.standard_id as standardId, b.standard_number as standardNumber, b.standard_name as standsrdName from testinfo a left join teststandard b on a.user_id=b.user_id and a.test_id=#{testId}
